Title: Apocalypse, Push
Plot: Arliss Howard reprises his role as Texas Ranger Kenneth Push, who returns to Allison's life when he experiences unnerving visions about a Phoenix-based slaying. Meanwhile, Joe tells a little white lie---and suffers the consequences.
GuestStars: Arliss Howard, Joe Stevens, Patrick Stinson, Rebecca Wisocky, Jason Pugatch, William Charlton, Russell Andrews, Link Baker, Jason Kaufman, Akiko Morison, Tina DiJoseph, Robert Curtis Brown
